summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to a defense attorney named Matt, regarding the appointment of representation for Ghitto Bonhomme and the service of a grand jury subpoena on him.

persons.name: Ghitto Bonhomme
persons.context: He is the individual on whom a grand jury subpoena was served, and for whom legal representation was recently appointed.

persons.name: Matt
persons.context: Addressed in the email, he was appointed to represent Ghitto Bonhomme the day before the email was sent.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, working in the Southern District of New York, who is providing a grand jury subpoena and requesting discussion.

connections.description: Matt was appointed to represent Ghitto Bonhomme in relation to a grand jury subpoena.
The prosecutor is involved in a grand jury investigation concerning Ghitto Bonhomme, as evidenced by the service of a subpoena.
Professional correspondence between a prosecutor and a defense attorney regarding a client and legal process.

events.title: Appointment of Defense Counsel
events.description: Matt was appointed to represent Ghitto Bonhomme.

events.title: Service of Grand Jury Subpoena
events.description: A grand jury subpoena was served on Ghitto Bonhomme, as indicated by the attached PDF filename.

keyFacts: Ghitto Bonhomme was served with a grand jury subpoena, indicating he was a subject or witness in a federal investigation.
Defense attorney Matt was appointed to represent Ghitto Bonhomme on August 20, 2019.
The correspondence is from an Assistant United States Attorney in the SDNY, showing active federal prosecutorial involvement.
The email attaches the subpoena document, dated August 15, 2019.
